name: The Drunken Peasants RPG: Revenge of the Manatee
name_original: The Drunken Peasants RPG: Revenge of the Manatee
description: A hilarious action adventure with Zelda style exploration, Bullet Hell style shooting fights,  Final Fantasy style turn based boss battles, and a variety of mini-games.  The DP RPG: Revenge of the Manatee has a little of everything.  Tons of references to the Drunken Peasants universe and related YouTube personalities.
